name: hard coal, run-of-mine to market for hard coal | hard coal | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/18941/documentation

This activity links hard coal, run-of-mine produced in hard coal mine operation/IN to market for hard coal /IN.

This activity starts with input of hard coal, run-of-mine produced in the mine. 

This activity ends with the provision of a hard coal which is supplied to the Indian market for hard coal.
